name: sample-auditbase-api-example
description: An Auditbase API key is necessary and can be obtained at [Auditbase](https://www.auditbase.com). The AUDITBASE_API_KEY environmental variable must be set. The AUDITBASE_WEBHOOK_URL environmental variable can be set if desired to receive a post request at the URL specified in AUDITBASE_WEBHOOK_URL with scan results after the scan is finished.
